segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children near the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, with splayed legs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his hand into a jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's definitely stealing cookies, that little rascal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up, clearly expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is one of eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried the stool is going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself badly, or break the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret operation is quite audacious, especially with the adult so close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's impressive how coordinated they are in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the danger of that unstable stool makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so focused on their prize, completely oblivious to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt from this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a ticking time bomb of a domestic accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
